author: bnicholes
msg: Added charset.c to the NetWare project file

author: rbb
msg: Getpass on Solaris has an 8 character limit, which makes it less than
useful.  By switching to getpassphrase, we get a 256 character limit.

author: stoddard
msg: Win32: Fix apr_stat() fooness. When passing in a filename like c:/foo/<a>,
the < and > were treated like wildcards and the apr_stat call would succeed
indicating a filename of perhaps 'aaa' if aaa were a directory in c:/foo.

author: rbb
msg: Add a new test, testfileinfo.  This came from the old testfile program,
but I split it up to make the tests more managable.
